## EntityProjectionFunc type

A function that mutate entity states

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type EntityProjectionFunc<T, K extends PossibleKeysOf<T>, C extends Change = Change, R extends ReadModel = ReadModel> = (change: C, state: EntityProjectionState<T, K>, view: ViewSnapshotFunc<R>) => Promise<void>;
```
